name: threebox
description: A Mapbox GL JS plugin that combines the power of the Three.js 3D library with Mapbox geospatial tools.
author: @peterqliu, @kronick & @jscastro76

scripts.all: browserify -g ./node_modules/uglifyify exports.js > dist/threebox.min.js && watchify exports.js --verbose -o dist/threebox.js && ncp ./dist C:\Users\jscastro\source\repos\archean-incubator\mapbox-poc\AdminLTE-master\Scripts\ --stopOnErr
scripts.test: browserify tests/threebox-tests.js > tests/threebox-tests-bundle.js; echo 'Open tests/threebox-tests.html to run tests in the browser.'
